abstract.p: Correction of review April 20 of photographs at Cohan and Leslie gallery; Ari Marcopoulos is photographer

block.p: A brief art review in Weekend last Friday about an exhibition of photographs at the Cohan and Leslie gallery in Chelsea misspelled the surname of a photographer. He is Ari Marcopoulos, not Marcopolous. The article also referred incorrectly to newspaper headlines shown in one of his photographs. They were headlines the day after the death of Abu Musab al-Zarqawi, the leader of Al Qaeda in Iraq, not headlines the day after Saddam Hussein's execution.
